attributes.action: deliver the promised referendum to our people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the British citizens, who have lived our entire lives in a near-perfect "Democracy", and we have grown up with sterling as our identity, and our knowledge that our voices will be heard. The Government  are trying to take that away from us. SIGN UP IF YOU CARE ABOUT DEMOCRACY!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
